p: The EZ-Fit enzyme kinetics was used to calculate the EC 50 and IC 50 values. All data were derived from three to twelve independent experiments and presented as mean ± standard deviation (SD). Statistical significance was analyzed by Student-t test, and one-way ANOVA with Tukey’s post hoc test. The p-value of less than <0.05 was considered statistically significant, and indicated with *, while p-value <0.01, and <0.001 are marked with ‡ and §, respectively.
